main.title: Sign Up for UDC 2020
description: The 2020 Upbit Developer Conference is a free online event.
Sign up to receive email updates and the official UDC 2020 newsletter.
All who sign up will be entered into a raffle to win mobile coupons. There could be a restriction on using the coupons if you are not a resident of South Korea.
Please note that your phone number and password will be required to confirm or modify your sign-up details.
Please contact the UDC 2020 Secretariat if you haven't recieved a confirmatrion e-mail after completing your sign-up.

step1.title: 1. Terms and Conditions
step1.totalAgreeCheckboxText: By Checking this box, I agree to the UDC 2020 Privacy Policy and to receive promotional material via email.
step1.agreePopUpText: 개인정보 수집 및 이용에 대한 안내약관(필수)에 동의해주셔야 합니다.
step1.checkbox1Text:
Please review the agreement(s) below and agree by selecting the checkbox(es),
You must agree with the terms of these agreements to continue.
step1.checkbox2Text: (Option) Receive promotional e-mails *Please agree with the terms of Promotional e-mails agreement to receive current information about UDC 2020.
step1.portraitAgreement: ※ The user has the right to refuse consent to the collection and use of his or her personal information, and there is no disadvantage even if the user refuses to consent. However, if the user refuses to give consent for the required consent(mandatory), he or she shall face limitations in using some services.

step2.title: 2. Attendee Information
step2.alreadyRegisteredPhoneNumber: 해당 핸드폰 번호는 이미 등록되어 있습니다.
